title: Forgot my email, plis help!
body: Hi guys. I need some advice. Its been a long time since i played this game, therefore i have forgotten my password to my old account and my old email. I remember my old account name Etc... I am sure that if "leauge of ledgends" could send me my old email i could crack the code so that i could change the password. suggestions?

replies.body: Your best bet for any account related issues would be to reach out to our account team using their [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Once you can verify that you created the account, the agent should be able to help you out!
